org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm

Class TasmFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm.TasmFileParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TasmParser

    public abstract class TasmFileParser
extends Object
implements TasmParser
    TasmFileParser can create parser objects that can parse TIGR Assembler encoded files (.tasm files). Files of this type are produced by the legacy TIGR Assembler program and usually have a file extension of .tasm or .asm. The .asm extension has been deprecated since it can be easily confused with TIGR Assembler's replacement, Celera Assembler, which also produces assembly files with a .asm file extension although the data is encoded completely differently.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static TasmParser create(File tasmFile)
                         throws IOException
        Create a new instance of TasmFileParser that will parse the given tasm encoded file.
        Parameters:
        tasmFile - a tasm encoded file.
        Returns:
        a new TasmFileParser instance; will not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if tasmFile is null.
        IOException - if tasmFile does not exist or is not readable.

      • create

        public static TasmParser create(InputStream in)
        Create a new instance of TasmFileParser that will parse the given tasm encoded InputStream. InputStream parsers can not create TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento via TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.createMemento() and TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.canCreateMemento() will always return false.
        Parameters:
        in - a tasm encoded InputStream.
        Returns:
        a new TasmFileParser instance that is not able to create mementos; will not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if tasmFile is null. or is not readable.
